name: How-far
tagline: a REST API providing distance trivia
body:
### how-far

A Java powered REST API providing distance & elevation related trivia.

Ever wondered how-far all those fitbit kilometres could get you? Or how high you could reach if all those Apple Watch tracked floors were piled on top of each other? Now you can.

API Docs coming soon...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
